Source.Name: perl-exporter-tiny
Source.Summary: Exporter::Tiny - an exporter with the features of Sub::Exporter but only core dependencies
Source.Description: Exporter::Tiny supports many of Sub::Exporter's external-facing features including renaming imported functions with the `-as`, `-prefix` and `-suffix` options; explicit destinations with the `into` option; and alternative installers with the `installer` option. But it's written in only about 40% as many lines of code and with zero non-core dependencies.
